channel.title: Customer Support Tabs
channel.description:
Has anyone done/seen anything interesting with a customer support tab?
Maybe the tab shows FAQ articles based on the user's URL.

item.title: Customer Support Tabs
item.dc:creator: daverodenbaugh
item.description:
You mean, instead of like a “Support” link or FAQ tab?

You could A/B test the title with your existing FAQ page and see if it resonates. You may have already done that. But I haven’t tried personally. I always use “Support” as a linked item in the menu.

Read full topic
